item.description:
Agenda

Introduction
***** Hello’s and Introductions
Questions
***** Confused by anything? Ask about it!
Summary
***** Brief synopsis of book and major themes
A) Human Actions = accomplish some good.
B) Man is a political animal
C) Relationships (defines 3 types)
D) Acquisition (unnatural vs. natural)
E) Criticism
*****1) Plato (Republic + Laws)
*****2) Phaleas
*****3) Sparta
*****4) Cretan
F) Citizenship
G) Constitutions (defined)
H) Government (defines 6 types)
I) Justice
J) Sovereignty
Discussion
**** Thoughts, feelings, opinions
Conclusion
**** Goodbye’s

Note: Dinner is usual order by members during the discussion. First timers please just ask for the Boston Philosophy Meetup at the front desk.
item.name: Aristotle's The Politics Books 1-3
